title: 2.2. Creating Jobs
intro: As explained in the Introduction to this section, Jobs are created by using the FieldLogs platform to acquire data, either Running a Template or Running 'Ad-hoc'. In this section we will explain in more detail the difference between the two and provide some examples of how to create Jobs.

blocks.content: Jobs can be created on all FieldLogs apps, across our supported clients (iOS, Android & our website). Jobs started while online are immediately and continuously synchronized to the Cloud, allowing such features as following a live Job in Real-Time. Jobs started while a device is offline (iOS & Android only) is stored locally until such moment that the device is back online. At which point, the Job is synchronized to the Cloud.
Let's get a better idea about how a Job is created. For more in-depth information about creating Jobs in different devices see 'Creating Jobs'
